definitions.definition: To transport (oil, etc.) in a tanker .
To carry more fuel than necessary for a flight , in order to avoid having to refuel at a destination where fuel is more expensive or in short supply.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To transport (oil, etc.) in a tanker .
secondary_definitions: ( aviation ) To carry more fuel than necessary for a flight , in order to avoid having to refuel at a destination where fuel is more expensive or in short supply.
